steps.name: When User clicks on the Admin tab from the menu
And Admin panel page should display Admin / User Management options
When User enters username "smith1234" in the search field
And User enters employee name "Sarah Smith"
And User clicks on the search button
Then I should see the results matching all fields "smith1234""Admin" "Sarah Smith""Disabled"
